content: materials the bobble sheep pillow bundle 1 now comes in a partridge superwash version which includes - main yarn 3 skeins of purl soho s partridge superwash 2 100% superwash wool in either heirloom white or wrought iron each skein of this chunky/bulky-weight yarn is 109 yards/ 100 grams approximately 270 yards required - contrast yarn 1 skein of purl soho s good wool 3 100% dyed andean highland wool in the color coastline gray each skein is 383 yards/ 100 grams approximately 75 yards required you ll also need… - us 9 5 5 mm 16- or 24-inch circular needles 4 - a set of us 9 double pointed needles 5 - a set of us 4 3 5 mm double pointed needles - stitch markers 6 including one unique - one 12-ounce bag of fairfield s poly-fil stuffing - scrap yarn in a worsted weight and a crochet hook to match for provisional cast on note because partridge superwash has a bit less yardage than the original partridge 7 this bundle now includes an extra skein the superwash version is also a touch thicker so the finished pillow has a slightly taller finished dimension gauge - 14 stitches and 20 rounds = 4 inches in bobble stitch see notes in pattern with main yarn on larger needles unblocked - 17 stitches and 30 rounds = 4 inches in garter stitch with main yarn on larger needles unblocked - 26 stitches and 36 rounds = 4 inches in stockinette stitch with contrast yarn on smaller needles unblocked size finished dimensions approximately 13½ inches long from chest to rear x 9½ inches tall from top of back to bottom of belly originally designed by purl soho designer laura ferguson 8 1 https //www purlsoho com/bobble-sheep-pillow-bundle html 2 https //www purlsoho com/partridge-superwash html 3 https //www purlsoho com/good-wool html 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796 5 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23799 6 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=964 7 https //www purlsoho com/partridge html 8 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/laura-ferguson-for-purl-soho/
